channel.title: Spec bar glitch?

item.title: Spec bar glitch?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

joeyjuggalo:

either figure out how to add it or go newb and dl another source and copy it

I don’t know of any sources that have special attacks.

Read full topic

item.title: Spec bar glitch?
item.dc:creator: @joeyjuggalo joeyjuggalo
item.description:
@joeyjuggalo wrote:

If you cant really figure out what we’re saying like above someone said

look for @yel@ then change those to @bla@ it may not have it i had a source like that before. either figure out how to add it or go newb and dl another source and copy it

Read full topic

item.title: Spec bar glitch?

item.title: Spec bar glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Ok search for something like:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && !Whip)

See how it has !Whip at the end?

Well, under it should be the S P E C I A L A T T A C K

Change the @yel@ to @bla@

Do that to all the things that have a !weapon at the end of it. Such as the !Whip one.

Read full topic

item.title: Spec bar glitch?

item.description:
@delta wrote:

Ok the spec bar words that say ‘S P E C I A L A T T A C K’ the words are always yellow, never shown in black. Does anyone know how to fix this? I looked around methods specialattacks1-6 they looked correct like

Does anyone know a fix for this?
